alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 11:52PM EST until February 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Levisa Fork at Prestonsburg affecting Floyd County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Levisa Fork at Prestonsburg. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Archer Park is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.3 feet by Friday evening. - Action stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM EST Friday.
